idea-plugin.name: Code Completion Quality Evaluation
idea-plugin.description:
The plugin deals with the quality evaluation of code completion based on artificial queries.

Usage:

  • Select files and/or directories for code completion evaluation.
  • Right click and select "Evaluate Completion For Selected Files"
  • Select strategy for actions generation in opened dialog.
  • After generation and interpretation of actions you will be asked to open the report in the browser.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
0.0.2
  • Headless mode
0.0.1
  • Support Java, Python and C#
  • Support different strategies of queries generation: token types, context and prefix
  • Support different quality metrics: Precision, Recall, F-Measure, Mean Reciprocal Rank and E-saved
